channel.title: Ubuntu on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on Greg Herlein

item.title: Ubuntu Again!
item.description: From 1997 to 2010 I believe it was only a matter of time before Linux on the desktop became a reality. I gave up in 2010 and went to OSX. But we may finally be close! Here’s my notes on installing Linux Ubuntu 18.04 on a Dell Inspiron 15 7000. It’s the easiest and happiest linux ever for me.
